Class CreatePartitionsOptions

  • java.lang.Object

  • @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class CreatePartitionsOptions
extends AbstractOptions<CreatePartitionsOptions>
    Options for AdminClient.createPartitions(Map). The API of this class is evolving, see AdminClient for details.
